metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Killing In The Name has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity and Melodic Complexity and below-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Killing In The Name has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Phrygian,  and D Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
